subtasks: Get rid of weeds in the garden
Mix soil and prepare garden bed with a tractor
Alternatively, manually remove weeds from garden
Wait two weeks after herbicide application before planting
Take a soil test every three years
Adjust soil pH to 6-6.5 for optimal vegetable growth
Correct blossom end rot by amending soil pH
Purchase soil test kits from local extension office or garden centers
Obtain more information by contacting the county extension office or visiting aces.edu
Plant seeds or transplants after soil preparation and testing
